segments.text: Darling , I am back . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am washing clothes . Are you hungry now ? Wait for a moment , I'll cook dinner for you . ( Steven bends his brows )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: B , should we get a maid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can do all the housework . We don't need a maid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have worked very hard in the office . If we can get someone to help you , you can have more rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are a good wife , Julia . But you must take care of yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me some time to think about it .
segments.speaker: S2
